lead_paragraph: Scotland's entertaining 36-20 Six Nations win over Italy in Rome on Saturday meant “absolutely everything” to Vern Cotter and his squad, according to captain Greig Laidlaw.

headline.print_headline: Scotland Win Over Italy Means Everything Says Hero Laidlaw
headline.main: Scotland Win Over Italy Means Everything Says Hero Laidlaw

snippet: Scotland's entertaining 36-20 Six Nations win over Italy in Rome on Saturday meant “absolutely everything” to Vern Cotter and his squad, according to captain Greig Laidlaw....
